title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Gaming where Average length in minutes is 24.7.
The lowest category is found at Music where Average length in minutes is 6.8.
The highest value at Gaming is almost 3.63 times larger than the minimum value of Music.
The highest value at Gaming is almost 3.63 times larger than the minimum value of Music.
The difference between the max Youtube Category Gaming and min Youtube Category Music is 17.9.
